'You've bumped into it and stumbled over it.'
The teacher said.
"What did he bump into?
He said.
When the Chan guest met, he only snapped his fingers.
The teacher said.
"Two heads, three sides.
He said.
"Kill the living temporarily.
The teacher said.
"Head, feet, and bottom!
The teacher said.
'I don't pick and choose when I enter a barren field.
Three thousand miles away it's dark and vast.
The ox head doesn't turn back like a horse head.
Ten billion million eons go by without a bargain.
He takes one moment and sets aside one link to create an extra limb.
In the past and present, no wind or wave arises.
Today, the mountain monk is sitting on one moment and cutting it off.
Let's just say.
Is there still a place for people?
The momentum of a thousand peaks reaches the edge of the cliffs and stops.
The sound of ten thousand schools goes out on the ocean.
He descended from his seat.
